description: Retrieves information about the specified finding. GetFinding and GetFindingV2 both use access-analyzer:GetFinding in the Action element of an IAM policy statement. You must have permission to perform the access-analyzer:GetFinding action.

parameters.name: analyzerArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the analyzer that generated the finding. The ARN of the analyzer that generated the finding.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the finding to retrieve. The ID of the finding to retrieve.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the finding.

nested_items.name: principal
nested_items.description: The external principal that has access to a resource within the zone of trust.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action in the analyzed policy statement that an external principal has permission to use.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: resource
nested_items.description: The resource that an external principal has access to.

nested_items.name: isPublic
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the policy that generated the finding allows public access to the resource.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The type of the resource identified in the finding.

nested_items.name: condition
nested_items.description: The condition in the analyzed policy statement that resulted in a finding.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the finding was generated.

nested_items.name: analyzedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the resource was analyzed.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the finding was updated.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the finding.

nested_items.name: resourceOwnerAccount
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID that owns the resource.

nested_items.name: error
nested_items.description: An error.

nested_items.name: sources
nested_items.description: The sources of the finding. This indicates how the access that generated the finding is granted. It is populated for Amazon S3 bucket findings.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Indicates the type of access that generated the finding.

nested_items.name: accessPointArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the access point that generated the finding. The ARN format depends on whether the ARN represents an access point or a multi-region access point.

nested_items.name: accessPointAccount
nested_items.description: The account of the cross-account access point that generated the finding.

nested_items.name: resourceControlPolicyRestriction
nested_items.description: The type of restriction applied to the finding by the resource owner with an Organizations resource control policy (RCP).
